items.title: Project Ideation
items.description: Definition of the core game mechanics, lore development, and technical feasibility study for the Shard.

items.title: Custom Map Creation
items.description: Designing and building a unique world map, featuring custom dungeons, cities, and wilderness areas.

items.title: New Custom Hide Types
items.description: Introduction of rare and exotic leather types harvested from unique creatures to enhance the crafting system.

items.title: New Hide Armor Sets
items.description: Designing and implementing exclusive armor sets crafted from custom hides, offering unique bonuses and aesthetics.
